mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPINFO (idx, facility, roadAddress, latitude, longitude, telephone, facilityInfo, facilityFeature, homepage, facilElectric, facilHotwater, facilWifi, facilFirewood, facilMarket) VALUES ( seq_campinfo.nextval, #{facility}, #{roadAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{telephone}, #{facilityInfo}, #{facilityFeature}, #{homepage}, #{facilElectric}, #{facilHotwater}, #{facilWifi}, #{facilFirewood}, #{facilMarket} )
